definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
(math.) the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter (π)

sentences.english: Any two diameters of a circle intersect each other.
Erected in the center circle with a vertical bar disk.
sentences.chinese: 在圓周的圓心豎一根與盤面垂直的直杆。

sentences.english: The rule of the pressure circumference distributing on the boat-tail's different sections is acquired.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了旋轉彈模型船尾不同截面圓周壓力分佈規律。

sentences.english: Let's now turn to uniform circular motion.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們講講勻速圓周運動。

sentences.english: Using either a circular or jiggling, up-and-down motion, brush this area with your toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 牙刷以圓周或者上下簸動的方式來刷這塊區域。

sentences.english: A wizard placed 10 cats inside a magic circle .
sentences.chinese: 一個男巫在一個魔術的圓周裏面放置了10只貓。

sentences.english: Start with the bottoms of your palms by clasping your fingers and rubbing the heels of your palms together in a circular motion.
sentences.chinese: 用手指按摩手掌心和腳後跟繞圓周方向運動。

sentences.english: The stirrer member has an outer ring and a central hub which are joined by circumferentially spaced spokes.
sentences.chinese: 攪拌器成員在外環和中央樞紐是由圓周間隔輻條加入。

sentences.english: The functions above determine the offset from the circle edge and length of each line.
sentences.chinese: 上述函數決定離開圓周的偏移量和各線段的長度。

sentences.english: Well, we see those moving in circles, they must be striving to move in circles.
sentences.chinese: 它們都在做着圓周運動，必然以其爲奮鬥目標。

sentences.english: Circles or diameters which have identical centers.
sentences.chinese: 圓周或者直徑有相同的圓心。

sentences.english: Work in small areas, applying using a small circular motion.
sentences.chinese: 工作在小範圍，申請使用小圓周運動。

sentences.english: Circumferentially oriented fibers increase the internal pressure containment capability of the flow tubes.
sentences.chinese: 圓周方向取向的纖維增加流量管容納內部壓力的能力。

sentences.english: The natural motion of heavenly objects is circular .
sentences.chinese: 天上的物體的自然運動是圓周運動。

sentences.english: An object goes around in a circle, has radius r and the object is here.
sentences.chinese: 一個物體作半徑爲r的圓周運動，它在這裏。

definition: dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
